name: vuetorrent
description: VueTorrent is a modern web UI for qBittorrent designed to replace the default interface. It provides a responsive, Vue-based frontend for managing torrents in self-hosted setups.

features.title: Torrent Management
features.description: Add, pause, resume, and remove torrents with intuitive controls

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access and manage torrents from desktop, tablet, or mobile devices

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Switch between light and dark themes for comfortable viewing

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search for torrents directly from the interface with built-in search

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organize torrents with categories and tags for better organization

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Adjust upload and download speed limits globally or per torrent

features.title: File Selection
features.description: Choose which files to download from multi-file torrents
